line.comment: * Task 1329.
* Zero Hour 1.10
* Herobetty 5.4: random value between X and Y requires X to be non-negative. Otherwise will return between 0 to Y.
* To get around this problem of returning only 0 to X rather than -X to X, we subtract X from the delay. Then get random value from 0 to 2*X.
* Simulate random between random(-offset, +offset) using: base - offset + random(0, 2*offset)
* Add-Ons 1.3: Duration reduced by 30% on insane.
* Final safety clamp: make sure it doesn’t go below 600 seconds, regardless of difficulty.
* ZH 1.10 - the Player cannot use infected OCV ships to fight Terraformer targets. If he tries his ships will turn immediately.
* if NPCs are ever able to build OCV ships too we might want to restrict this to player only
* if [OWNER] == [Player]
* end
* all OCV ship designs in the same sector are now also turning into OCV. Including docked ships
* only OCV type ships
* we also stop the OCV virus task on the other ships
* we also need to stop all non OCV type ships which might be in his fleet
* Turn into OCV and start a team of invaders
* we also need to stop all non OCV type ships which might be in his fleet
* ** DEBUG (added in 1.4.22) **
* $test = 'OCV ship size: ' + $ocvShips.size
* write to player logbook $test
* ** END DEBUG **
* ** DEBUG (added in 1.4.22) **
* $test = 'OCV ship value turned: ' + $OCVshipValueTurned
* write to player logbook $test
* ** END DEBUG **
* Add-Ons 1.4.21: Update progress when ships convert. The player must sacrifice 300 fleet power worth of OCV ships to advance the plot.

line.text: 'Общая мощь флота, принесённая в жертву OCV: '
' злы на вас, из-за ваших кораблей OCV погибших вблизи их секторов! ('

line.comment: * ZH 2.0 - some custom ship names cause trouble

sval.val: Общая мощь флота, принесённая в жертву OCV:
злы на вас, из-за ваших кораблей OCV погибших вблизи их секторов! (
Herobetty 5.4: random value between X and Y requires X to be non-negative. Otherwise will return between 0 to Y.
To get around this problem of returning only 0 to X rather than -X to X, we subtract X from the delay. Then get random value from 0 to 2*X.
Simulate random between random(-offset, +offset) using: base - offset + random(0, 2*offset)
Add-Ons 1.3: Duration reduced by 30% on insane.
Final safety clamp: make sure it doesn’t go below 600 seconds, regardless of difficulty.
ZH 1.10 - the Player cannot use infected OCV ships to fight Terraformer targets. If he tries his ships will turn immediately.
if NPCs are ever able to build OCV ships too we might want to restrict this to player only
all OCV ship designs in the same sector are now also turning into OCV. Including docked ships
we also stop the OCV virus task on the other ships
we also need to stop all non OCV type ships which might be in his fleet
Turn into OCV and start a team of invaders
we also need to stop all non OCV type ships which might be in his fleet
Add-Ons 1.4.21: Update progress when ships convert. The player must sacrifice 300 fleet power worth of OCV ships to advance the plot.
ZH 2.0 - some custom ship names cause trouble
